channel.title: [508] ~ Last Origin ~ Your End Is Near ~ HD ~ [508]
channel.description:
[center]----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Introduction The main aim of this server is to create a stable, decent and realistic server, with both most the 508 features. Decent, meaning nice economy, no customs Items, Npcs. Base - Palidino v3. How come I'm not going to use a Released server.. Because useing other people's server and calling it your own work is classed as stealing and I think it's going to more fun to do my own work and be proud. I plan on making a fun and playable server that has both stability and a decent economy. Since I’ve been i n so many projects with people, I've decided to go it alone, and stick with this project, and make it worth the time spent on it. [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/2ryn15d.png[/img] I decided to stop working on that last project due to serveral reasons, the main reason was I distracted with many things, many of the reasons was very personal. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Server News [22/7/2009] Started the Project. [23/7/2009] Made the server HD. Added some Packets. Fixed Specials. Shops have been started. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- I don't plan on taking anyone in, sorry. I've realised that team projects sometimes don't work out, unless you know the person's talents and background. also this Source will not be released so do not ask. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Expected Features * Complete Tradeing * Private Messaging * Perfected Skilling base * Mini-Games * Clue Scrolls * Npc Dialogue * Correct Packets * Most of the current 508 Features * Complete Banking Features * Clan Chat * Shopping base * Quests and Diarys * Extreme Stability * Complete Npc Spawns ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Server Beta Testing Form
MoparScape Name: Age: Email:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Become A Supporter
MoparScape Name: Rate My Project: How Come You Want To Support:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]

item.title: [508] ~ Last Origin ~ Your End Is Near ~ HD ~ [508]
item.dc:creator: @Jane Jane
item.description:
@Jane wrote:

[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Introduction

The main aim of this server is to create a stable, decent and realistic server, with both most the 508 features.
Decent, meaning nice economy, no customs Items, Npcs.

Base - Palidino v3.

How come I’m not going to use a Released server…

Because useing other people’s server and calling it your own work is classed as stealing and I think it’s going to more fun to do my own work and be proud.

I plan on making a fun and playable server that has both stability and a decent economy. Since I’ve been i n so many projects with people, I’ve decided to go it alone, and stick with this project, and make it worth the time spent on it.

I decided to stop working on that last project due to serveral reasons, the main reason was I distracted with many things, many of the reasons was very personal.

Server News

[22/7/2009]

Started the Project.

[23/7/2009]

Made the server HD.
Added some Packets.
Fixed Specials.
Shops have been started.

I don’t plan on taking anyone in, sorry. I’ve realised that team projects sometimes don’t work out, unless you know the person’s talents and background. also this Source will not be released so do not ask.

Expected Features

* Complete Tradeing
* Private Messaging
* Perfected Skilling base
* Mini-Games
* Clue Scrolls
* Npc Dialogue
* Correct Packets
* Most of the current 508 Features
* Complete Banking Features
* Clan Chat
* Shopping base
* Quests and Diarys
* Extreme Stability
* Complete Npc Spawns

Server Beta Testing Form

MoparScape Name: Age: Email:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Become A Supporter

MoparScape Name: Rate My Project: How Come You Want To Support:
